select role_group_no, role_group_name, company_no from tbl_role_group where role_group_use = true and company_no = #{companyName}
and role_group_name like concat('%', #{roleGroupSearch}, '%')

SELECT em.orga_no em_orga_no , dt.orga_no dt_orga_no , c.orga_no com_orga_no , dt.dept_no , c.company_no , em.emp_no , em.emp_name , em.username , em.emp_rank , dt.dept_no , dt.dept_name , c.company_name FROM (SELECT d.dept_no , d.company_no , d.dept_name , d.ord , o.orga_no , o.orga_type FROM tbl_dept d LEFT JOIN tbl_dept_mapping dm ON dm.dept_no = d.dept_no LEFT JOIN tbl_orga o ON o.orga_no = dm.orga_no WHERE d.del_flag = FALSE AND d.main_flag = TRUE AND d.company_no = ${companyNo} ## 회사 구분 ) dt JOIN (SELECT e.emp_no , e.emp_name , e.username , em.emp_rank , o.upper_orga_no , o.orga_no FROM tbl_emp e LEFT JOIN tbl_emp_mapping em ON em.emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN tbl_orga o ON o.orga_no = em.orga_no) em ON em.upper_orga_no = dt.orga_no JOIN tbl_company c ON c.company_no = dt.company_no AND c.company_use = TRUE WHERE em.upper_orga_no in (SELECT o.orga_no FROM tbl_role_group rg JOIN tbl_orga_role or2 ON or2.role_group_no = rg.role_group_no JOIN tbl_orga o ON o.orga_no = or2.orga_no WHERE rg.company_no = ${companyNo} AND rg.role_group_use = TRUE AND rg.role_group_no = ${roleGroupNo}
AND ( dt.dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userListSearch}, '%') OR em.emp_rank LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userListSearch}, '%') OR em.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userListSearch}, '%') OR em.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userListSearch}, '%') )
